description:
Mystogan, or Prince Jellal as the people from Edolas know him, has set Anima in reverse and all the magic power of Edolas is being sucked into Earthland! But Panther Lily can`t bring himself to go along with Jellal`s plan to sacrifice himself to make Lily as the new king... However the only way to calm the people is to set up a battle between a villain and a hero... Suddenly, a trio of evil-doers shows up wrecking havoc in the city, claiming to have stolen away Edolas`s magic power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: バイバイ エドラス
